summary.para: The security binding template for specifying the use of an application supplied security context security binding. This security binding may be used only with message security. So, it is used in conjunction with another transport security or message security binding that provides message protection.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_CONTEXT_MESSAGE_SECURITY_BINDING_TEMPLATE.securityBindingProperties
member.summary: Application provided security binding properties that cannot be represented in policy.
